name: The Kingdom 0.4 Standard Version
description:
Continuation of the story from 0.3 plus loads more features. You can find the full change-log here.

This game is no longer using the RPG Maker MV Engine. We switched to Ren'Py due to it makes sense story wise and makes everything much more smoother.

Currently set to a minimum of $1 due to 0.4 Standard is only available to Patrons. 

You must be over the age of 18 to play this game due to it contains adult material.
